name: Nightmare Sonic Blast! (Pre-Errata)
text:
[ Skill activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
[ Effect ]
You can activate this Skill while you control "Serpent Night Dragon". Once per turn, you can reveal the top 4 cards of your Deck, use 1 of the following Skills, depending on the number of monsters revealed.
● 1: Add one of the revealed cards to your hand.
● 2: Destroy 1 card your opponent controls.
● 3 or more: Apply both effects.
Then place the rest of the revealed cards on top of your Deck in any order.
